alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:22PM EDT until July 13 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hamilton County in eastern New York... Herkimer County in eastern New York... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 322 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Star Lake to New London, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Speculator, Old Forge, Ohio, Lake Pleasant, Poland, Inlet, Cold Brook, Blue Mountain Lake, Lake Eaton Campground, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Big Moose, Eighth Lake Campground, Lewey Lake Campground, McKeever, Golden Beach Campground, Moffitt Beach Campground, Limekiln Lake Campground, Nicks Lake Campground, Eagle Bay and Forked Lake Public Campground. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
